DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness aggressive multimodal regimen versus standard multimodal ACL repair use hamstring graft patient surgery outpatient surgicenter .
DOC.criteria: Patients orthopedic surgeon study team schedule ACL repair use hamstring graft leg consider inclusion study . Other inclusion criterion follow : 1 . American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status 13 2 . 1855 year age , inclusive 3 . BMI < 40 kg/m2 . 4 . Consents general anesthesia preoperative femoral nerve block case . Exclusion criterion include : 1 . Any contraindication femoral nerve block 2 . Allergy local anesthetic , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication , ketamine , acetaminophen , hydromorphone , oxycodone 3 . Peripheral central nervous system disease 4 . Renal hepatic impairment 5 . History opioid dependence current regular narcotic use 6 . Significant psychiatric disease 7 . Pregnancy lactation ( verbal report ) 8 . Seizure Disorder 9 . History post operative nausea vomit 10 . Latex allergy 11 . Clinically significant cardiac pulmonary disease
